title: EndBot
body:
<< name noone >> 
Oh jeez, you scared me!

<< name littleOne >> 
Oh, I’m sorry!

<< name noone >> 
It’s quite alright, I wasn’t doing anything important anyway.

<< name littleOne >>
What are those doors behind you?

<< name noone >> 
Ah… those are the doors to the human world. They built multiple to ensure that we would be locked down here. I’ve been here for a while now, hoping that one day they might open.

<< name littleOne >>
Don’t you want to do anything else than sit here and wait?

<< name noone >> 
No, no I don’t. I just want to sit here and wait. I once had a dream that these doors opened one day, and I want to be here when my dream comes true.

<< name littleOne >>
What was your dream like?

<< name noone >> 
Past the doors, I saw the vast blue oceans and walked among the lush green forests of the overworld.
Although, I only know what those things look like from old books and movies...
Speaking of books and dreams, I read this book once. I can’t quite remember what it was called, but I do remember that the main character asked himself “do androids dream?”
I really can’t tell you whether what I feel are dreams or some sort of error in my code, but I like to think they are dreams. I hope my dreams come true, and that one day we will escape this place and be allowed our own spot in the overworld.
...
Tell me, do you believe in dreams?

<< name littleOne >>
Do you believe in dreams?
[[ I do |Ido]]
[[ I'm not sure |Notsure]]

title: Ido
body:
<< name noone >>
I see… maybe i shouldn’t feel to bad for wasting my days “dreaming”, or whatever it might be. 
You know, a human from long ago once said, “I dream. Sometimes I think that's the only right thing to do.”
I like to think that he was right...

title: Notsure
body:
<< name noone>> 
I see… i guess it really doesn’t matter what you label these dreams, thoughts, or encoded experiences. I remember hearing someone say something once that stuck with me:
“all that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.”
I like to think that he was right...
